tags: tony is trying to be a good dad but his daughter is just like him
summary: Morgan Stark headcannon #1
body:
Morgan Stark headcannon #1

After being told that her big brother Peter is still at school by her dad, Morgan manages to hijack an iron man suit by overriding F.R.I.D.A.Y using her daddy’s super secret code (big surprise.. its SPIDERBABY).

After hijacking said suit, Morgan flies it into the gym of Peter’s school where he is trying to act like doing 50 pushups in the time span it took an average guy or Flash to do 20 is super tiring.

Enough said as the gym roof was blasted through by an iron man suit which lands in front of the terrified students and opens up to allow Morgan to jump into a super confused and shocked Peter Parker.

“PETEY!!”

“M-Morgan?!”

In the meantime Tony is freaking out about having another genius kid of his outsmarting him and being plain reckless as he zooms to Midtown High

“Yes dear, I’ll call you back…I’m playing hide n seek with our daughter who is with me in the tower right now”

“TONY!!!”

tags: tumblr user ironmanarmor = a tired tonky stan
summary: tony stark, in canon: respects women and trusts them over himself, praises them, and has never said anything that would lead you...
body:
tony stark, in canon: respects women and trusts them over himself, praises them, and has never said anything that would lead you to believe he has a low opinion of women

yall: tony stark is a mysoginist

tony stark, in canon: has never had an interaction with a person of color where he insulted them or disliked them because of their race

yall: tony stark is racist

tony stark, in canon: has never even said anything relating to the lgbt community and is actually confirmed bisexual in the comics

yall: tony stark is homophobic, biphobic, transphobic, etc

but like. okay lol

blog.name: marvelheroesassemble
blog.title: Marvel Your Universe
blog.description:
Will

Big huge and die hard Marvel fan.

Love all things Marvel and the MCU.

Love the Avengers.

Especially, the Original Six.

Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, the Hulk,

Black Widow and Hawkeye.

Robert Downey, Jr., Chris Evans,

Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo,

Scarlett Johansson and Jeremy Renner.

They’re my babies.

They hold a very special place in my heart.

All of them are legendary and iconic.

Love all the other heroes too.

Marvel is my Inspiration and my home!

"Avengers Assemble"

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: lose my heart again each time I hear your name
title: lose my heart again each time I hear your name
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OA7yqF

by laireshi

Tony and Steve used to have sex sometimes, no strings attached. Steve was okay with that, really. But now he’s Commander Rogers, Tony doesn’t remember the war that tore them apart, and oh, he’s also accused of committing a murder. Steve’s supposed to keep an eye on him, but being in close quarters with Tony once again proves more difficult than he imagined.

Words: 10494, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel 616, Avengers (Comics)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, and briefly another Steve and another Tony
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Angst, Fix-It, Friends With Benefits, Getting Together, Trust Issues, Commander Rogers, Post-Civil War (Marvel)

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: The smallest Avenger
title: The smallest Avenger
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qCSpem

by katbux

Thanos was defeated. The survivors were able to get back the Gauntlet and reverse the Snap. Everything is fine, or is it?

What happened to the old hurts and distrust?

They are still there of course. But Steve is stubborn, he wants the Avengers back together, but Tony cannot forget that easily.

But what if someone took away all that hurt and bad memories? What if instead of a grown-up there was a child Tony instead?

Words: 1816, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America: The Civil War, Doctor Strange (2016), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Avengers: Infinity War - Fandom
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Relationships: Tony Stark/Stephen Strange, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Tony Stark & Avengers Team
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Thanos is defeated, Post-Captain America: Civil War (Movie), Age Regression/De-Aging, De-Aged Tony Stark, Kid Tony Stark, Everybody Lives, Restored Avengers, Broken Team, Broken Team Dynamics, Civil War Team Iron Man, Panic Attacks, Domestic Fluff, Hopeful Ending

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qCSpem

They are still there of course. But Steve is stubborn, he wants the Avengers back together, but Tony cannot forget that easily.

But what if someone took away all that hurt and bad memories? What if instead of a grown-up there was a child Tony instead?

Words: 1816, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English
